activation.reactionTrigger: when you fail a saving throw against an effect that would cause you to become grappled, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, restrained, or stunned

system.description: Starting at 6th level, once per round when you fail a saving throw against an effect that would cause you to become grappled, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, restrained, or stunned, you can spend 1 sorcery point, and reroll one d20 used in the saving throw.
